title: Get Out
description: A young Black man visits his white girlfriend's family estate, uncovering a disturbing secret. Jordan Peele's directorial debut blends psychological horror with sharp social commentary.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
description: Teenager Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man and joins forces with counterparts from other dimensions to save the multiverse. Acclaimed for its innovative animation and storytelling.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy household, leading to unexpected consequences. Bong Joon-ho's Oscar-winning film satirizes class dynamics with humor and suspense.

title: Knives Out
description: Detective Benoit Blanc investigates the death of a wealthy novelist, unraveling family secrets and lies in this modern whodunit.

title: Lady Bird
description: A high school senior navigates love, family, and self-identity in Sacramento, California. Greta Gerwig's directorial debut captures the nuances of adolescence.

title: Dunkirk
description: Allied soldiers are evacuated from Dunkirk during World War II in this intense, immersive war film directed by Christopher Nolan.

title: Eighth Grade
description: An introverted teenage girl attempts to survive the last week of her disastrous eighth-grade year before starting high school. A poignant look at adolescence in the age of social media.

title: Ford v Ferrari
description: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford, challenging Ferrari at Le Mans.

title: The Florida Project
description: A six-year-old girl lives with her rebellious mother in a budget motel near Disney World, exploring childhood innocence amidst poverty.

title: The Handmaiden
description: In 1930s Korea, a con man hires a pickpocket to become the maid of a Japanese heiress, intending to defraud her, but unexpected emotions complicate their plan.
